level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish standards and requirements for ensuring that a natural gas utility and natural gas service providers operating in the District of Columbia meet an adequate level of quality, reliability, and safety in the natural gas service provided to District of Columbia customers.

This chapter shall apply to all natural gas utility and natural gas service providers operating in the District of Columbia, subject to the authority of the Public Service Commission of the District of Columbia (Commission).

All written Natural Gas Quality of Service Standards (“NGQSS”) quarterly and annual reports, studies, surveys, or filings required to be submitted to the Commission shall be docketed under Formal Case No. 977 (“F.C. 977”).
